sentences.sentence: A testator may revoke or alter a will he previously made.
sentences.translation: 遗嘱人可以撤销、变更自己所立的遗嘱。

sentences.sentence: A will needs the signature of the testator and two witness.
sentences.translation: 一份遗嘱需要立遗嘱人和两个证人的签字。

sentences.sentence: A will nee ds the signature of the testator and two witness.
sentences.translation: 一份遗嘱需要立遗嘱人和两个证人的签字。
